1.text: Find a bra you can use for practice.

2.text: Check out the mechanism that keeps a bra fastened.

3.text: Practice unhooking the bra with one hand.

4.text: Slide your hand up the back of her shirt to her bra band.

5.text: Slip your middle and index fingers under the band and pull it away from her body.

6.text: Place your thumb on the other side of the band.

7.text: Slide or push your thumb over your two fingers, unhooking the hooks.

8.text: Move you hand up between her breasts and feel for the clasp in the center of the bra.

9.text: Slide your middle and index finger under the clasp and lift it away from her body.

10.text: Press your thumb against the clasp.
